trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli usati per tenere traccia e gestire gruppi di controlli correlati.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartCollection è una raccolta di sola lettura di controlli, in genere utilizzato da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlli per gestire i set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a WebPartCollection object to keep a list of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control uses a WebPartCollection object to track the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza un oggetto WebPartCollection per mantenere un elenco di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in una pagina, mentre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllo utilizza un oggetto WebPartCollection per tenere traccia di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in esso contenuti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The WebPartCollection collection contains both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones and used as part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > WebPartCollection la raccolta contiene sia <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli e altri controlli server (ad esempio i controlli utente, i controlli personalizzati e controlli ASP.NET) che vengono inseriti in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone e utilizzati come parte delle applicazioni Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: So, for example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, both controls will be in the WebPartCollection collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, ad esempio, se dispone di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>in una pagina della zona e all'interno di esso si dichiara un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo e ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>controllo, entrambi i controlli sarà nella raccolta WebPartCollection a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto WebPartCollection esiste in modo che il set di controlli Web part può funzionare con le raccolte fortemente tipizzate.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can get a reference to a WebPartCollection object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, se si desidera eseguire le operazioni di massa in un set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, è possibile ottenere un riferimento a un oggetto WebPartCollection utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to loop through all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page and change their appearance in some way.
trans-unit.target: È ad esempio per ciclo di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in una pagina e modificarne l'aspetto in qualche modo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Even though the WebPartCollection object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Anche se l'oggetto WebPartCollection è di sola lettura, è possibile apportare modifiche a livello di codice alle proprietà dei controlli sottostanti a cui viene fatto riferimento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza vuota di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore WebPartCollection Inizializza un'istanza vuota della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto stesso è di sola lettura e non contiene alcun metodo per aggiungere singoli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli; pertanto, sarà necessario little occasione per utilizzare questo costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> object by passing in an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> oggetto passando un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class by passing in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore WebPartCollection Inizializza un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>classe passando una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of controls, and pass that to the WebPartCollection constructor.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto è di sola lettura ed è presente alcun metodo per aggiungere singoli controlli, è possibile creare <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>raccolta di controlli e passarlo al costruttore WebPartCollection.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo è possibile creare raccolte personalizzate e operazioni bulk.

trans-unit.source: You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile accedere ai controlli sottostanti nella raccolta e modificarne i valori di proprietà a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: webParts is .
trans-unit.target: webPartsis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un controllo specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di verificare un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che viene controllato per determinare se è nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se un particolare controllo è contenuto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto, un subset di tali controlli o un superset di tali controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> oggetti in cui viene copiata insieme.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in una pagina Web part ed è necessario conoscere la posizione ordinale di un controllo rispetto agli altri.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro della raccolta in base alla posizione nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object by index, and change their property values or call methods.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore elemento consente di accedere all'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>dell'oggetto in base all'indice e modificarne i valori di proprietà o chiamare i metodi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro della raccolta in base a un identificatore di stringa univoco.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore elemento consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto in base a un identificatore univoco.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Di controlli Web part esegue una corrispondenza che tra maiuscole e minuscole, pertanto tale distinzione maiuscole/minuscole non fa parte di univoco `id` valore.

trans-unit.source: The Item property also works to identify members of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object in some specialized cases.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento può essere utilizzata anche per identificare i membri di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto in alcuni casi specializzati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: In caso di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlli, l'indicizzatore è in grado di corrispondenza l'identificatore del controllo figlio sottostante di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: In caso di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>controlli, l'indicizzatore corrisponde all'identificatore del controllo basato su un confronto tra maiuscole e minuscole del `id` parametro e il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>i valori delle proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore univoco per un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of id.
trans-unit.target: Il primo nella raccolta il cui ID è uguale al valore di id .
